ModMetaData.name: TerrainMovementKit
ModMetaData.author: Pyrce
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]SwimmingKit[/h1]
A RimWorld mod which enables other mods to specify different movement speeds and restrictions based on terrain and pawn stats.
[h1]Description[/h1]
The mod acts as a toolkit for adding swimming statistics to the game. It makes pawns respect a new baseStats for both moving through specific terrain and for planning pathing through such terrain.
[h1]How to Use[/h1]
TODO
For more details please read the [url=https://github.com/MSeal/RimworldTerrainMovementKit]Github TerrainMovementKit page[/url].
